items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills
flavourText: There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.
explicitMods: Cursed Enemies take 58% increased Damage while on Low Life
Cursed Enemies are Debilitated for 2.00 Seconds when they Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range

hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

items.name: Dusk Braid
fracturedMods: +1 to Level of all Cold Skill Gems

items.name: Heatshiver
explicitMods: Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 100% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. 75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield

I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
